PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05302020-07-10,  ,  ,  ,  LAB,  ESDC
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that employees in the federally regulated sector that are unable or unavailable to work as a result of COVID-19 are able to continue to take job-protected leave without risking loss of employment.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0166 Publication Date: 2020-07-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that employees in the federally regulated sector that are unable or unavailable to work as a result of COVID-19 are able to continue to take job-protected leave without risking loss of employment.
